res.cmd:
# Attempt 1: Try Unix Socket (Works for fresh installs via sudo)
STATUS=$(mariadb -u root -N -s -e "SHOW STATUS LIKE 'wsrep_local_state_comment'; SHOW STATUS LIKE 'wsrep_cluster_status';" 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}')

# Attempt 2: Fallback to Password
if [ -z "$STATUS" ]; then
  PASS="StrongPass123!"
  STATUS=$(mariadb -u root -p"$PASS" -N -s -e "SHOW STATUS LIKE 'wsrep_local_state_comment'; SHOW STATUS LIKE 'wsrep_cluster_status';" 2>/dev/null | awk '{print $2}')
fi

echo "${STATUS:-OFFLINE}"
